actions.description: The myrmidon makes three Scimitar attacks.
actions.name: Multiattack

actions.description: 7 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 7 (1d6 + 4) force damage.
actions.name: Scimitar

actions.description: The myrmidon uses Multiattack. Each attack that hits deals an extra 7 (2d6) fire damage.
actions.name: Fiery Strikes (Recharge 6)

languages: Ignan, one language of its creator's choice
name: Fire Elemental Myrmidon [MoM]
resistances: bludgeoning, piercing, slashing from nonmagical attacks

specialTraits.description: The myrmidon sheds bright light in a 20-foot radius and dim light in a 40-foot radius.
specialTraits.name: Illumination

specialTraits.description: For every 5 feet the myrmidon moves in 1 foot or more of water, it takes 2 (1d4) cold damage.
specialTraits.name: Water Susceptibility
